title.rendered: Market Leader Launches Real Estate’s Most Comprehensive Solution

content.rendered:
Market Leader now offers the real estate industry’s only comprehensive lead-to-close system! Over 100,000 Market Leader customers have instant access to tools and technology that will help them achieve long-term success.

We’ve added so much extra power to our agent and broker systems that the names have changed. Growth Leader is now Market Leader Professional and RealtyGenerator is now called Market Leader Business Suite. Both systems include everything agents and brokers need to manage and market their real estate business—all in one convenient solution.

Accomplish more with the new Marketing Center

Market Leader Professional and Market Leader Business Suite each now come with a complete—Marketing Center, with user-friendly marketing materials to help real estate professionals power their brand and capture more buyers and sellers.

  • Get the perfect look: Choose from over 4,000 templates for flyers, postcards, newsletters, drip campaigns, and more—for direct mail or email.
  • Enjoy simplicity: Creating and editing your own marketing pieces is easy and fun, with no complicated software or shortcut keys to learn.
  • Connect with buyers and sellers: Launch automated, custom campaigns for your entire database or targeted groups.
  • Save time and money: Our “set-it-and-forget-it” technology helps you reach customers automatically while you concentrate on closing sales.

Read the Marketing Center press release.

Do it all with login, one price, one company

Whether you’re an agent or you run an office, Market Leader Professional and Business Suite make it easy for you to be focused and productive. You’ll never need to look elsewhere for your real estate products!

Lead generation

Drive hundreds of motivated leads each month using Craigslist, search widgets, pay-per-click advertising, and other features to help you capture more business.

Contact management

Easily separate buyers from the browsers, track business performance, and cultivate relationships that result in closed sales.

Marketing Center

Boost your brand with thousands of professionally designed templates for print and email—including flyers, postcards, automated campaigns, and more.

Websites

Set yourself apart with a polished real estate website that captures new leads while helping you manage and grow your business.

Education

Reach your goals with free training, education, and online resources that come with your Market Leader system.

Learn more about how Market Leader Professional and Market Leader Business Suite can help your business thrive!
